name: The Final Boss (itch) (AlexHopkins)
description: You are tasked with ridding the village of a monster, who's been terrorizing the land. Your only choice is to fight it at it's own home. The village chose you, so remember that. Every decision you make will affect you, and the outcome that awaits you. Choose wisely hero, because one wrong step, and you might just find yourself as the monster's next meal. Or worse.
